name: Giannetti, Appellant, v. Lower Bucks County Joint Municipal Authority

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Eagen and Mr. Justice Robeets dissent.

casebody.head_matter:
Giannetti, Appellant, v. Lower Bucks County Joint Municipal Authority.
Argued May 6, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Michael Brodie, with him Harry Lore, and Dorfman, Pechner, Sachs & Dorfman, for appellant.
Frederick E. Smith, with him Smith & Toner, for appellees.
July 2, 1970:
